tool.name: Subset Genbank File by Accessions
tool.description: given an accession list, extract a subset of the genbank records into a new file.

param.help: List of Accessions to extract from Genbank file, one per line
param.label: Accession list
param.name: accession_list

param.help: Accession numbers have versions, setting strict indicates an exact version match is required
param.label: Strict ID comparisons
param.name: strict

tool.help:
Extract Subset of Genbank File by Accessions ============================================
Sometimes you have a "master" database of genbank records, a single huge file containing all of your genomes, then you do somet analysis which generates a list of accession numbers, and you need to extract those from the main file for downstream analysis.
Please ensure that your accession list contains one accession number per line
Strict ------
Sometimes you'll download a genbank file from NCBI and it will have IDs like:
- NC_005824.1 - NC_005829.1
and your accession list will look like:
- NC_005824 - NC_005829
In that case, turn strict off as it enforces exact matches of IDs.
